#summary Communications for ICARUS

= ROS Topics =

== ICARUS_Probe ==
Messages pertinent to the ICARUS Probe.

* PROBE_STATUS

Broadcast from the Motion_Controller Node.

_Definitions_

{{{
PROBE_MOVING_FORWARD = 1
PROBE_MOVING_REVERSE = 2
PROBE_EXTENDED = 3
PROBE_RETRACTED = 4
PROBE_ERROR = 5
}}}

* CHARGE_COMMAND

Send to the Motion_Controller Node.

_Definitions_

RECHARGE_START

RECHARGE_STOP
